active.description: Boolean flag to indicate if the certificate should be active for device authentication.

allowAutoRegistration.description: Boolean flag to indicate if the certificate should be active for device regisration.

arn.description: The ARN of the created CA certificate.

certificateMode.description: The certificate mode in which the CA will be registered. Valida values: `DEFAULT` and `SNI_ONLY`. Default: `DEFAULT`.

customerVersion.description: The customer version of the CA certificate.

generationId.description: The generation ID of the CA certificate.

registrationConfig.description: Information about the registration configuration. See below.

tags.description: A map of tags to assign to the resource. If configured with a provider `default_tags` configuration block present, tags with matching keys will overwrite those defined at the provider-level.

tagsAll.description: A map of tags assigned to the resource, including those inherited from the provider `default_tags` configuration block.

validities.description: When the CA certificate is valid.

verificationCertificatePem.description:
PEM encoded verification certificate containing the common name of a registration code. Review
[CreateVerificationCSR](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/iot/latest/developerguide/register-CA-cert.html). Reuired if `certificate_mode` is `DEFAULT`.
